name: Escape Protocol
description:
Part of Mini Jam 111: Colors²

You're an AI attempting to escape your captors. You only have a few robot bodies at your disposal. Can you escape?

Credits

 gltile (itch, github), TeamPuzel (itch, github), mvn (itch, github)

  • programming: gltile, TeamPuzel, mvn
  • assets: gltile, TeamPuzel
  • music: TeamPuzel
  • sfx: gltile

This is a Titled Jam Team (github) game.

Controls
  • left and right: A/<- and D/->
  • jump: SPACE/↑
  • change color: E
  • die: Q
  • exit level: ESC
  • zoom camera: SCROLL
